document.full_text: nigerian singer femi kuti was named best artist in songlines magazine's annual world music awards, winning praise for dynamic songs that railed against corruption and repression in africa.
document.title: nigeria's femi kuti lauded as best world music artist
lines_and_colors: nigerian singer femi kuti was named best artist in songlines magazine's annual world music awards, winning praise for dynamic songs that railed against corruption and repression in africa.
